ygData.subject: That was crazy
ygData.msgSnippet: Phew what a time that was, i didnt get a chance to be involved with the actual fight. BUT i did get to battle the undead forces for about 15 min in
ygData.messageBody:
Phew what a time that was, i didnt get a chance
to be involved with the actual fight. BUT i did get
to battle the undead forces for about 15 min in
kithicor....that was until a gm showed up and took them away
because the loot was too good =( Yes the light side won
on our server. There were about 115 people in
kithicor woods fighting the undead in the aftermath...and
i have to say it was the funest camp i got involved
with. The undead even gave exp to me, kithicor was a
deadly place those nights.<br><br>Kaylin, 43 Bard on the
Mithaniel Marr server
